content: a simple beginner friendly brioche pattern for a slouchy and cosy beanie with a folded up brim and a big fluffy pompom written for one adult size - the stretchy nature of the brioche stitch means it will comfortably fit most head sizes knit from the bottom up with stretch cast on single colour brioche and decreases at the crown sample shown in pure elements dk mini gradient set on 58 5cm/23 head **materials** yarn - 1x john arbon textiles pure elements dk 250m/100g or 4x 25g or any other dk yarn needles - 3 75mm circular needles or dpns pompom maker tapestry needle stitch marker **gauge and measurements** the hat measures approx 48 cm/18 wide and 26 5cm/10 5 long gauge 18 sts and 46 rounds in brioche pattern in 10cm/4
